structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations

law.catch_line: Effect Of Signature Of Married Minor Woman
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 6. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] The signature of a married woman who is a minor affixed by her to any instrument relating to the conveyance of land of her husband shall have the same effect as if she were of full age.
